directions: Replace 2 tablespoons cream with amaretto liqueur in Perfect Pumpkin Pie.
Mix cookie crumbs with almonds. Sprinkle over filling just before baking. Bake and cool pie as directed.
Can be made 8 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature.
ingredients: 20 Amaretti di Saronno cookies (about 4 1/4 ounces), crumbled into pieces that are 1/2 inch or smaller
title: Amaretto-Almond Streusel Pumpkin Pie
